name: Set.mem_symmDiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u
a : α
s t : Set α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (symmDiff s t) a) (Or (And (Membership.mem s a) (Not (Membership.mem t a))) (And (Membership.mem t a) (Not (Membership.mem s a))))
decl:
theorem mem_symmDiff : a ∈ s ∆ t ↔ a ∈ s ∧ a ∉ t ∨ a ∈ t ∧ a ∉ s :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Set.symmDiff_def
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t : Set α
⊢ Eq (symmDiff s t) (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) (SDiff.sdiff t s))
decl:
protected theorem symmDiff_def (s t : Set α) : s ∆ t = s \ t ∪ t \ s :=
  rfl

name: Set.symmDiff_subset_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t : Set α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (symmDiff s t) (Union.union s t)
decl:
theorem symmDiff_subset_union : s ∆ t ⊆ s ∪ t :=
  @symmDiff_le_sup (Set α) _ _ _

name: Set.symmDiff_eq_empty
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t : Set α
⊢ Iff (Eq (symmDiff s t) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection) (Eq s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem symmDiff_eq_empty : s ∆ t = ∅ ↔ s = t :=
  symmDiff_eq_bot

name: Set.symmDiff_nonempty
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t : Set α
⊢ Iff (symmDiff s t).Nonempty (Ne s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem symmDiff_nonempty : (s ∆ t).Nonempty ↔ s ≠ t :=
  nonempty_iff_ne_empty.trans symmDiff_eq_empty.not

name: Set.inter_symmDiff_distrib_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t u : Set α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s (symmDiff t u)) (symmDiff (Inter.inter s t) (Inter.inter s u))
decl:
theorem inter_symmDiff_distrib_left (s t u : Set α) : s ∩ t ∆ u = (s ∩ t) ∆ (s ∩ u) :=
  inf_symmDiff_distrib_left _ _ _

name: Set.inter_symmDiff_distrib_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t u : Set α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (symmDiff s t) u) (symmDiff (Inter.inter s u) (Inter.inter t u))
decl:
theorem inter_symmDiff_distrib_right (s t u : Set α) : s ∆ t ∩ u = (s ∩ u) ∆ (t ∩ u) :=
  inf_symmDiff_distrib_right _ _ _

name: Set.subset_symmDiff_union_symmDiff_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t u : Set α
h : Disjoint s t
⊢ HasSubset.Subset u (Union.union (symmDiff s u) (symmDiff t u))
decl:
theorem subset_symmDiff_union_symmDiff_left (h : Disjoint s t) : u ⊆ s ∆ u ∪ t ∆ u :=
  h.le_symmDiff_sup_symmDiff_left

name: Set.subset_symmDiff_union_symmDiff_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u
s t u : Set α
h : Disjoint t u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset s (Union.union (symmDiff s t) (symmDiff s u))
decl:
theorem subset_symmDiff_union_symmDiff_right (h : Disjoint t u) : s ⊆ s ∆ t ∪ s ∆ u :=
  h.le_symmDiff_sup_symmDiff_right
